metadata.title: CVE-2018-8741 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A directory traversal flaw in SquirrelMail 1.4.22 allows an authenticatedattacker to exfiltrate (or potentially delete) files from the hostingserver, related to ../ in the att_local_name field in Deliver.class.php.

criterions.comment: squirrelmail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
